title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory:
text_raw:
1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory: 

Eurofins WEJ Contaminants GmbH 
Neuländer Kamp 1 
21079 Hamburg 
Germany.
text_norm: 1 following laboratory designated official laboratory eurofins wej contaminant gmbh neulander kamp 1 21079 hamburg germany

title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 2. The members of the following class of persons are designated as
text_raw:
2. The members of the following class of persons are designated as 

approved examiners at the above designated official laboratory: 

state-certified food chemist. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 August, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th August, 2024.
